title: Program for Enhancing Reflective Thinking in Augmented Reality-Based Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Physics Concepts (Waves, Energy, etc.) and Fundamental Smartphone Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Modular Content Structured in 15-Minute Units Considering Learners’ Time Constraints, with a Repeating 3-Step Structure of AR Experience-Question-Reflection

learning_goals: Learners can predict wave phenomena using AR simulations and quantitatively describe observational results
Learners can write at least three reflective thinking records after each experimental phase via system-embedded question prompts
Learners can identify and propose corrections for over 80% of errors in inquiry processes through peer feedback sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
